explanation: Funds are required to purchase, configure, and deploy maritime patrol surveillance aircraft to support continued counternarcotics and detection monitoring activities pursuant to Title 10, U.S.C. Section 124, in the U.S. Southern Command area of responsibility. The Department of Defense Appropriations Act, 2023, provided funds for one maritime patrol surveillance aircraft. This reprogramming will allow for the purchase of a second aircraft. This is a congressional special interest item.

â€˜Funds are available in the Drug Interdiction and Counter-Drug Activities, Defense, 23/23 appropriation for reprogramming to Aircraft Procurement, Air Force, 23/25, to purchase one maritime patrol surveillance aircraft under the existing USSOUTHCOM PALE ALE program contract in place to support counternarcotics detection monitoring mission requirements.
